nodes.text: Strike III was a roleplaying-game adventure in year five of the Living Force campaign. It was the third adventure in the For Every Action trilogy and was written by Rob Edwards and edited by Ron Heintz and Margaret Heintz.

The heroes are confronted on the remote planet of Holador by bounty hunters hired by the Hutt Riboga. They are able to escape their clutches and, with the help of the Cularin Militia, are able to capture Riboga.
